v0.1.0.description:
Initial release

jsons.zip contains a couple jsons used in testing, incase you want to play one of the hacks in any of them. The ones in oldjsons are from before cannons were randomized, you'll need to reimport them into the generator and add cannons yourself.
v0.1.0.title: v0.1.0

v0.1.1.description:
Fixed issue where if you generated more than one world, an error would appear after generation

Also, no more jsons.zip, the json files will now be located [here](https://github.com/DNVIC/sm64hack-archipelago-jsons)
v0.1.1.title: v0.1.1

v0.2.0.description:
Added support for hacks with 8 stars per level (star revenge 0, etc.)
Added DeathLink support
Removed the starcount.asm file, and the need for ARMIPS. Instead, with the [latest client](https://github.com/DNVIC/Archipelago-StarDisplay/releases/latest), it will automatically apply the patch when you connect to the server (this will not modify the rom file itself)
v0.2.0.title: v0.2.0

v0.2.1.description: fixed minor issue where the victory requirements would spread to everything in the "other" category
v0.2.1.title: v0.2.1

v0.2.5.description:
Added a new "BizHawk" client, which will deprecate the StarDisplay client on the next major version. Do NOT use BizHawk to connect to this, connect to it by running the attached scripts in Luna's Project64
Also, you are now allowed to "declare victory" using the Victory.js file, in case you need to for some reason. Running this script will make you declare victory in AP
v0.2.5.title: v0.2.5

v0.2.6.description: hopefully fixed the "other" category for good now, should be no generations problems with that anymore
v0.2.6.title: v0.2.6

v0.2.7.description: fixed a very dumb mistake i made that made key 1 check unobtainable sometimes
v0.2.7.title: v0.2.7

v0.3.0.description:
Changelog:

Changed "Star" to "Power Star
Added badge support for sr7/sr7.5/sr8
Useless items (cannon/keys/caps/badges) are marked as junk

NOTE: This version breaks old clients, you will no longer be able to use the stardisplay client with this version.
v0.3.0.title: v0.3.0

v0.3.1.description: Fixed client issues with secret 3 cannon
v0.3.1.title: v0.3.1

v0.4.0.description:
Changelog:

Fixes:
- Deathlink should no longer send multiple deaths if you pause the game
- The star count when playing with hacks with 8 stars per level will no longer miscount and think there are 7 stars in each level (but still set the 8th star flag anyways)
- When reconnecting to a new slot using a different hack, it no longer still thinks that you are still playing the first hack
- Nonprogressive items (potentially cannons, keys, caps, or badges) are useful, instead of useless
- Stars past the highest required star count for the hack are useful instead of progressive

QOL:
- There is an option in the JSON generator to make a star act-specific, and if it is act specific it will require all the previous stars to be possible in order to get it
- JSONs now have their own progressive key option, which is a preferred default, though users can still change it if they prefer a different option
- The Progressive Key yaml option has 2 new settings, `json`, which used the previously-mentioned default in the JSON, and `reversed`, where you get key 2 before key 1
- The APWorld now comes bundled in with the JSON repository. It will automatically search for JSONs either bundled in with the apworld, or in the new sm64hack_jsons folder (with priority to the sm64hack_jsons folder). You can organize subfolders in the sm64hack_jsons folder and it will accept it, as long as there isn't duplicate file names

New Features:
- Star Revenge 3.5 Black Switch support. It's only required for 1 check and only adds 1 extra check but it uses the same code as the SR6.25 Yellow Switch so why not
- Star Revenge 6.25 full support!!! 214 normal stars, 2 cannon stars, 2 keys, 4 cap switches, and 1 Troll Star (!) make this biggest and most expansive romhack to be supported by this apworld!
- Troll Stars are now (optionally) able to be shuffled! Each level with a troll star will have 1 check for collecting any troll star in the level. But beware... new items need to be created to fill the new checks created by the troll stars...
- Traps! 4 new traps are included in this version of the apworld! Don't want to spoil them all, but 3 are based on community suggestions, and 1 is an idea I had when making one of the others. By default, every troll star will be replaced by a trap (this is the recommended option, as I feel it is fitting), but if you really don't like traps, you can instead replace them with singular coins. And don't worry about submitting to an async, logging on, and getting bombarded with 10 traps all at once in castle grounds; there's a special feature where if you receive a trap while you're offline, each trap will randomly pop in while you're playing, with an average time of 5 minutes per stored trap.
v0.4.0.title: v0.4.0

v0.4.1.description:
Bugfixes:
- Fixed an issue which occurred a lot more often if you had Australian ping
- Fixed weird badge logic issues
- Fixed game crash if you receive a trap in the middle of file/star select
- Fixed Overworld Cannon (again)
v0.4.1.title: v0.4.1 - The Australian Update

v0.4.2.description:
Bugfixes:
- Fixed weird cap logic issue

QOL:
- Updated readme
- Added template yaml file to release

Updated JSON files and put them in the release

Victory and connector not updated between releases, so do not redownload them if you have them already
v0.4.2.title: v0.4.2

v0.4.2.1.description:
Bugfixes:

- Fixed SR7.5 JSON
- Fixed issue with external hosting not working when changing the progressive key option from 'json'
- Removed debug print statements
v0.4.2.1.title: v0.4.2.1

v0.4.2.2.description:
- Fixed the weird UT behavior on the old version (note: UT does not work on games genned in the old version, but it does work fine on games genned in the new version
- Updated the JSONs for Star Revenge 6.25 and Star Revenge 4
v0.4.2.2.title: v0.4.2.2

v0.4.2.3.description:
Bugfixes:

- Updated client to allow you to reset your game, resyncing progress after the reset; you should save and load a state after resetting though.

JSON Updates:

- C1S6 in SR6.25 requires wing cap now
- C3 Troll Star in SMTW exists
- SR7.5 C11S3/C11S6 now logically requires either ultra badge or wall badge rather than hard requiring ultra badge. This is the case in both the casual and expert logics.
v0.4.2.3.title: v0.4.2.3

v0.4.2.4.description:
Bugfixes:

- Fixed death being sent when walking through specific doors (which don't kill you)
- Fixed 2 deaths occasionally being sent when falling into the void

JSON Updates:

- Endings fixed in Star Revenge 5 (apparently this was supposed to be in last update, oops)
- Slide cannon exists in Peach's Memory
- Star revenge 8 (and advanced) actually assign the stars in the mausoleum correctly (star 6 doesn't require super badge anymore, star 2 does instead)
- Updated the formats of timeless rendezvous, eureka, grand star, koopa power, phenomena, and shining stars repainted to match the v0.4 standard
- Updated Star Revenge 7 to actually require Wall Badge for Wakati Tower
- Updated Star Revenge 7.5 to remove a star that doesnt exist in the password room (forgot to remove it after debugging stuff)
- Updated Star Revenge 7.5 Expert to add new tricks that are now humanly possible

New JSONs:

- Kaizo Mario 64
- Plutonium Mario 64
v0.4.2.4.title: v0.4.2.4

v0.4.3.description:
Should be backwards-compatible with games generated on old versions, lemme know if it isnt

New Features:

- Moat is now an item/location that can be optionally shuffled, with an option to disable it if you don't want to

QOL:

- Stars, keys, and caps sent will be synced when playing based on previous checks sent, useful if two people are connected to the same slot so they know what stars the other person has gotten
- Stars are now deprioritized (This requires v0.6.3, unfortunately I'm pretty sure you will have to update because of that)

JSON Updates:

- SM64, Kaizo Mario 64, and Ztar Attack Rebooted have been updated to support moat rando. 
- Ztar Attack Rebooted updated to fix major logic errors
- Treasure World has looser logic since I didn't know certain skips existed and it's a kaizo hack so they should be in logic since they're not that hard
- Shining Stars Repainted doesn't think there's 8 stars per level anymore
- Fixed Star Revenge 3.5 to actually make the black switch exist
- Fixed weird whitespace in SR7 JSON
- Fixed various issues in Despairs Mario's Gambit
v0.4.3.title: v0.4.3

v0.4.3.1.description:
Bugfixes:

- The moat no longer exists for hacks without a moat
- Fixed victory transferring between hacks if you switch hacks with the same client window
- Fixed traps immediately activating if you switch hacks with the same client window
- Fixed star sync breaking if you ever receive a cannon

QOL:

- Non-mario choir traps are automatically set to be in non_local_items.
- If you get a mario choir while you currently have one, it should add to the timer rather than reset the timer

New JSONs:

- Added Star Revenge 5.5
v0.4.3.1.title: v0.4.3.1

v0.4.3.2.description:
Bugfixes:

- Disabling troll stars no longer prevents hacks with troll stars from genning (probably not found until now because no one disables them)
- Disabling moat no longer prevents hacks without the moat from genning

JSON Updates:

- Super Mario 74 updated to 0.4 (must've slipped through the cracks)
- Star Revenge 7 and Star Revenge 8 no badges removed because they have outdated logic and are still on v0.3, and occasionally confused people. If you really want to play without badge rando, just plando the badges to the vanilla locations.
v0.4.3.2.title: v0.4.3.2

v0.4.3.3.description:
## Json Updates

### Minor
- Added Star Revenge 6.9
- Added Star Revenge 3.9 (v2.0)
- Added Star Revenge 0.5
### Major
- Added Star Revenge 1.3
- Added Star Revenge X
### Hard
New folder I created, for light kaizo/hard casual hacks. Basically an intermediary between full-on kaizo hacks and casual hacks.
- Added Star Revenge 2.5
- Added Star Revenge 4.9
- Added Star Revenge 3.9 (v1.0)
- Moved Super Mario Fantasy 64 and SM74 Ten Years After into this folder since I felt they fit in here more
### Kaizo
- Added Star Revenge 2 Night of Doom
### Dogshit
Another new folder, this time for hacks which are comically badly designed. Just don't want people playing them without knowing what they're getting into
- Added Super Mario 64 Red is Dead
v0.4.3.3.title: v0.4.3.3

v0.4.4.description:
# Major Changes
Removed the bundled json files from the APWorld. Instead, every time you generate a game it will automatically download the latest JSON files from the github page, if your APWorld version is up to date enough to support the json file. The sm64hack_jsons folder now has 2 subfolders, downloaded_jsons (where the aformentioned downloaded jsons go), and custom_jsons, which is where you should now be placing your custom jsons. 

This should mean that you don't have to keep downloading new versions of the APWorld just for json updates, and I don't need to go through rebuilding the APWorld just to update 1 json.

If you have any custom jsons in the sm64hack_jsons folder from the previous release, you do not need to manually move them over to the custom_jsons folder, they will be moved automatically during your first generation. These will still override the jsons in downloaded_jsons

And if you do not want to enable automatic updates, there is an option in host.yaml to disable it.

# Minor Changes
- Uses user_path instead of home_path for the json folder. Should only matter if you're running the .tar.gz version of Archipelago
- Castle Moat location/item should no longer be created if you are playing Star Revenge 3.5 or Star Revenge 6.25
- Removed debug print statement for badges that I kept on forgetting to remove for like 5 updates now
- Added manifest file since I need to do that now

# JSON updates since last release
## Kaizo
- Updated Night of Doom json (c6 actually requires metal cap now)
## Major
- Mystic Purple Stars updated (idk whats actually different)
- Added Super Joan Bros. 64 3
## Special
- Various updates to Star Revenge 3.5
v0.4.4.title: v0.4.4

v0.4.4.1.description:
# Bugfixes
- Fixed SSL certificate error on tar.gz install
- Fixed sr6.25 and sr3.5 trying to set rules for the Castle Moat location

# JSON updates since last release

## Kaizo
- Added Super Mario 74 Extreme Edition
## Major
- Made Mario and the Mystic Purple Stars have progressive keys
v0.4.4.1.title: v0.4.4.1

v0.4.4.2.description:
# Bugfixes
- Hopefully finally truly fixed the moat stuff for sr3.5 and sr6.25
- If github decides to rate limit you, you are still able to gen now.
# JSON Updates since last release
## Kaizo
- Added Mario's Nightmare 64
## Major
- Updated Star Revenge 6.5 to allow using overworld cannon to get on top of the castle, and fix the toad star requirements
v0.4.4.2.title: v0.4.4.2

v0.4.4.3.description:
# Misc. Changes
- Updater now only runs once per generation so hopefully rate limits are less common
- Generic filler item method created, not used internally, only for external changes (i.e. filler items from item_links)
- A new setting, filler_trap_percentage, to decide what percent of the above filler items should be traps as opposed to coins

# JSON Updates since last release

## Special
- Updated Star Revenge 7 to require super badge for stars 4 and 5 in Kobra Canyon
v0.4.4.3.title: v0.4.4.3
